card.name: Honorbound
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+2. Equipped creature has protection from nonwhite as long as it's tapped. (This permanent can't be targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything nonwhite as long as it's tapped.) Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, exile target nonland permanent that player controls. Equip {2}{W}

card.name: Gibliver Shiver-Givers
card.text: {1}{R}: Target opponent gains control of another permanent you control. Put two fuse counters on that permanent. It gains "At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fuse counter from this" and "When the last fuse counter is removed from this, sacrifice it and it deals 4 damage to you." (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand. You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

card.name: Mirrorscale Dragon
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever Mirrorscale Dragon deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {R}{R}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of Mirrorscale Dragon.

card.name: Herald of the Pack
card.text: When Herald of the Pack enters the battlefield, create two 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens. {G}, Sacrifice a Wolf: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. {1}{G}: Target Wolf you control fights target creature you don't control.

card.name: Lark, the Misanthrope
card.text: Flying, deathtouch, lifelink When Lark, the Misanthrope enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. {W}{B}: Exile Lark. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of your next upkeep. It gains haste.

card.name: Delia, the Fanatic
card.text: Flying, haste, prowess Whenever you cast a spell that costs exactly {U}, draw a card. Whenever you cast a spell that costs exactly {R}, Delia, the Fanatic deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Fervid Curator
card.text: When Fervid Curator enters the battlefield, search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. card.text: Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may play the top card of your library. If it's a permanent card with converted mana cost 6 or less, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.

card.text: If this spell targets a blocked or blocking creature, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. Exile target creature with power or toughness greater than its converted mana cost.

For each card chosen this way, search its owner's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with the same name as that card and exile them, then that player shuffles their library.
